comments.body: I'm definitely not sure about that `inits.head.pos`
You can do `inits.headOption.fold(t.pos)(_.pos)` to sleep good at night. Feel free to merge!

yeah, the doubt is mostly about the position rather than the code itself.

I'll merge anyway, we can always fix it later.
